instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2936 short to ground PPBUS_G3H
threads.message:
logic board liquid damage short to ground on PPBUS_G3H,

I cleaned around smc and isl area (corrosion)

how can i find this short ?

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2936 short to ground PPBUS_G3H
threads.message: Inject voltage and see what heats up. There is a chance a high side FET is shorted so check all other rails first for shorts to GND before injecting voltage. Start low at 1V and monitor current draw.

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2936 short to ground PPBUS_G3H
threads.message:
i've not stabilized power supply for inject voltage,

i will check all other rails 

if possible inject with battery 1,5v AAA ?

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2936 short to ground PPBUS_G3H
threads.message:
i ordered psu

I have checked all other rail no shorts, i

i cleaned motherboard with ultrasonic, now no short to ppbus_g3, now i have 4V, any idea ?

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2936 short to ground PPBUS_G3H
threads.message: What was corroded in the first place? What is the resistance between pins 17/18 and pins 27/28 of U7000? Is R7005 20 ohms?

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2936 short to ground PPBUS_G3H
threads.message:
17/18 3,2ohms 27/28 of U7000 20,4 ohms, R7005 20ohms (replaced because 265ohms)

Corroded in first smc area,  backlight driver area with fuse backlight, next u7000 area

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2936 short to ground PPBUS_G3H
threads.message: If R7005 was bad the ISL6259 usually killed it. Check R7005 again and replace ISL.

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2936 short to ground PPBUS_G3H
threads.message: Check R7005 again? Voltage on DCIN pin of U7000?

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2936 short to ground PPBUS_G3H
threads.message: R7005 20 ohms voltage on dcin pin2 of u7000 16,6V

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2936 short to ground PPBUS_G3H
threads.message:
Solved bad R7025, 

have you an explication why lowers ppbus_g3h at 4v 

old value of r7025 is open line

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2936 short to ground PPBUS_G3H
threads.message:
[QUOTE="aurel476, post: 19036"]Solved bad R7025,

have you an explication why lowers ppbus_g3h at 4v

old value of r7025 is open line[/QUOTE]
Read this data sheet and compare the typical application diagram to that of your schematic and board view. Then read the notes on pin out and operation.
Pages 4, 7, 8 ..... The package and pinout is not the same but I assume the label pins do the same job.

[URL="http://www.intersil.com/content/dam/Intersil/documents/isl6/isl6269a.pdf"]http://www.intersil.com/content/dam/...6/isl6269a.pdf[/URL]
